title: Textile, 1800–1850
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground. Central large-scale tree with many different blossoms. Small flanking tree on either side. Floral sprays, insects, birds and animals scattered over the ground. Border of massed flowers and fruit with perching birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–1850.
1800–1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-11.
